file.name: customers.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /v1/customers:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Create customer
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Create customer
        spa: Crear cliente
        por: Criar cliente
      description: Create a customer with all its data and save the cards used to simplify the payment process
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Create a customer with all its data and save the cards used to simplify the payment process
        spa: Realiza la creación de un cliente con todos sus datos para poder guardar las tarjetas que utilice y simplificar el proceso de pago
        por: Crie um cliente com todos os seus detalhes para que você possa salvar os cartões que eles usam e simplificar o processo de pagamento
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: String
                  example: "jhon@doe.com"
                  description: Customer's email. 
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's email.
                    spa: Email del cliente
                    por: E-mail do cliente
                first_name:
                  type: String
                  example: Jhon
                  description: Customer's name. 
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's name.
                    spa: Nombre del cliente
                    por: Nome do cliente
                last_name:
                  type: String
                  example: Doe
                  description: Customer's last name.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's last name.
                    spa: Apellido del cliente
                    por: Sobrenome do cliente
                phone:
                  type: object
                  description: Customer phone's information.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer phone's information.
                    spa: Teléfono del cliente
                    por: Telefone do cliente
                  properties:
                    area_code:
                      type: String
                      example: '55'
                      description: Phone's area code.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Phone's area code.
                        spa: Código de área
                        por: Código de área
                    number:
                      type: String
                      example: '991234567'
                      description: Phone number.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Phone number.
                        spa: Número telefónico
                        por: Número de telefone
                identification:
                  type: object
                  description: Customer identification's information.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer identification's information.
                    spa: Información sobre la identificación del cliente
                    por: Informações sobre a identificação do cliente
                  properties:
                    type:
                      type: String
                      example: 'CPF'
                      description: Identification type.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Identification type.
                        spa: Tipo de identificación
                        por: Tipo de identificação
                    number:
                      type: String
                      example: '12345678900'
                      description: Identification number.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Identification number.
                        spa: Número de identificación
                        por: Número de identificação
                default_address:
                  type: String
                  example: "Home"
                  description: Customer's default address.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's default address.
                    spa: Dirección por defecto del cliente
                    por: Endereço padrão do cliente
                address:
                  type: object
                  description: Default address's information.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Default address's information.
                    spa: Información sobre la dirección por defecto del cliente
                    por: Informação sobre o endereço padrão do cliente
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: String
                      example: '123123'
                      description: Address ID.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Address ID.
                        spa: Identificador de la dirección
                        por: Identificador de endereço
                    zip_code:
                      type: String
                      example: '01234567'
                      description: Zip code.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Zip code.
                        spa: Código postal
                        por: Código postal
                    street_name:
                      type: String
                      example: 'Rua Exemplo'
                      description: Street name.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Street name.
                        spa: Calle
                        por: Rua
                    street_number:
                      type: number
                      example: 123
                      description: Street number.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Street number.
                        spa: Número
                        por: O Número
                date_registered:
                  type: Date(ISO_8601)
                  example: '2021-10-20T11:37:30.000-04:00'
                  description: Customer's registration date.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's registration date.
                    spa: Fecha de registro del cliente
                    por: Data de registo do cliente
                description:
                  type: String
                  example: 'Description del user'
                  description: Customer's description.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's description.
                    spa: Descripción del cliente
                    por: Descrição do cliente
                default_card:
                  type: String
                  example: 'None'
                  description: Customer's default card.  
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's default card.
                    spa: Tarjeta por defecto del cliente
                    por: Cartão padrão do cliente     
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 000000001-sT93QZFAsfxU9P5
                    description: Customer ID.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer ID.
                      spa: Identificador de cliente
                      por: Identificador de cliente
                  email:
                    type: string
                    example: jhon@doe.com
                    description: Customer's email.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's email.
                      spa: Email del cliente
                      por: E-mail do cliente
                  first_name:
                    type: string
                    example: Bruce
                    description: Customer's name.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's name.
                      spa: Nombre del cliente
                      por: Nome do cliente
                  last_name:
                    type: string
                    example: Wayne
                    description: Customer's last name.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's last name.
                      spa: Apellido del cliente
                      por: Sobrenome do cliente
                  phone:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      area_code:
                        type: string
                        example: 23
                        description: Phone's area code.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Phone's area code.
                          spa: Código de área
                          por: Código de área
                      number:
                        type: string
                        example: 12345678
                        description: Phone number.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Phone number.
                          spa: Número telefónico
                          por: Número de telefone
                    description: Customer phone's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer phone's information.
                      spa: Teléfono del cliente
                      por: Telefone do cliente
                  identification:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      type:
                        type: string
                        example: DNI
                        description: Identification type.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identification type.
                          spa: Tipo de identificación
                          por: Tipo de identificação
                      number:
                        type: string
                        example: 12345678
                        description: Identification number.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identification number.
                          spa: Número de identificación
                          por: Número de identificação
                    description: Customer identification's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer identification's information.
                      spa: Información sobre la identificación del cliente
                      por: Informações sobre a identificação do cliente
                  address:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        example: '1162600094'
                        format: nullable
                        description: Address ID.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Address ID.
                          spa: Identificador de la dirección
                          por: Identificador de endereço
                      zip_code:
                        type: string
                        example: SG1 2AX
                        description: Zip code.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Zip code.
                          spa: Código postal
                          por: Código postal
                      street_name:
                        type: string
                        example: Old Knebworth Ln
                        description: Street name.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Street name.
                          spa: Calle
                          por: Rua
                      street_number:
                        type: number
                        format: nullable
                        description: Street number.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Street number.
                          spa: Número
                          por: O Número
                    description: Default address's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Default address's information.
                      spa: Información sobre la dirección por defecto del cliente
                      por: Informação sobre o endereço padrão do cliente
                  date_registered:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Customer's registration date.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's registration date.
                      spa: Fecha de registro del cliente
                      por: Data de registo do cliente
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: This is my description
                    description: Customer's description.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's description.
                      spa: Descripción del cliente
                      por: Descrição do cliente
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: '2018-02-20T15:36:23.541Z'
                    description: Customer's date created.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's date created.
                      spa: Fecha de creación del cliente
                      por: Data de criação do cliente
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Last modified date.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Last modified date.
                      spa: Fecha de la última modificación
                      por: Data da última modificação
                  metadata:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      source_sync:
                        type: string
                        example: source_ws
                    description: metadata
                  default_card:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Customer's default card.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's default card.
                      spa: Tarjeta por defecto del cliente
                      por: Cartão padrão do cliente
                  default_address:
                    type: string
                    example: '1162600094'
                    format: nullable
                    description: Customer's default address.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's default address.
                      spa: Dirección por defecto del cliente
                      por: Endereço padrão do cliente
                  cards:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                    description: Customer's cards.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's cards.
                      spa: Tarjetas del cliente
                      por: Cartões do cliente
                  addresses:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                    description: Customer's addresses.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's addresses.
                      spa: Dirección del cliente
                      por: Endereço do cliente
                  live_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                    description: Whether the customers will be in sandbox or in production mode.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Whether the customers will be in sandbox or in production mode.
                      spa: Indica si los clientes se crean en el entorno de sandbox o producción
                      por: Indica se os comentários são criados no ambiente de sandbox ou produção
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 100--the credentials are required.
                      - 101--the customer already exist.
                      - 102--missing customer id.
                      - 103--parameter must be an object 
                      - 104--parameter length is too large.
                      - 105--the customer id is invalid.
                      - 106--the email format is invalid.
                      - 107--the first_name is invalid.
                      - 108--the last_name is invalid.
                      - 109--the phone.area_code is invalid.
                      - 110--the phone.number is invalid.
                      - 111--the identification.type is invalid.
                      - 112--the identification.number is invalid.
                      - 113--the address.zip_code is invalid.
                      - 114--the address.street_name is invalid.
                      - 115--the date_registered format is invalid.
                      - 116--the description is invalid.
                      - 117--the metadata is invalid.
                      - 118--the body must be a Json Object.
                      - 119--the card is required.
                      - 120--card not found.
                      - 121--the card is invalid.
                      - 122--the card data is invalid.
                      - 123--the payment_method_id is required.
                      - 124--the issuer_id is required.
                      - 125--invalid parameters.
                      - 126--invalid parameter. You cannot update the email.
                      - 127--invalid parameter. Cannot resolve the payment method of card, check the payment_method_id and issuer_id.
                      - 128--the email format is invalid. Use 'test_payer_[0-9]{1,10}@testuser.com'.
                      - 129--the customer has reached the maximum allowed number of cards.
                      - 140--invalid card owner.
                      - 150--invalid users involved.
                      - 200--invalid range format (range=:date_parameter:after::date_from,before::date_to).
                      - 201--range attribute must belong to date entity.
                      - 202--invalid 'after' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 203--invalid 'before' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 204--invalid filters format.
                      - 205--invalid query format.
                      - 206--attributes to sort must belong to 'customer' entity.
                      - 207--order filter must be 'asc' or 'desc'.
                      - 208--invalid 'sort' parameter format.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - unauthorized--unauthorized.
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - not_found--not_found.
  /v1/customers/{id}:
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Update customer
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Update customer
        spa: Actualizar cliente
        por: Atualizar cliente
      description: Renew the data of a customer. Indicate the customer ID and send the parameters with the information you want to update
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Renew the data of a customer. Indicate the customer ID and send the parameters with the information you want to update
        spa: Renueva los datos de un cliente. Indica el ID del cliente y envía los parámetros con la información que quieras actualizar
        por: Atualize os dados de um cliente. Indique o ID do cliente e envie as informações que você deseja atualizar
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Customer ID.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Customer ID.
            spa: Identificador de cliente
            por: Identificador de cliente
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 123123
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: String
                  example: "jhon@doe.com"
                  description: Customer's email. It can only be updated if the customer has not yet associated an email.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's email. It can only be updated if the customer has not yet associated an email.
                    spa: Email del cliente. Solo puede ser actualizado si el cliente no tiene un email asociado aún.
                    por: E-mail do cliente. Só pode ser atualizado se o cliente ainda não tiver um e-mail associado.
                first_name:
                  type: String
                  example: Jhon
                  description: Customer's name. 
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's name.
                    spa: Nombre del cliente
                    por: Nome do cliente
                last_name:
                  type: String
                  example: Doe
                  description: Customer's last name.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's last name.
                    spa: Apellido del cliente
                    por: Sobrenome do cliente
                phone:
                  type: object
                  description: Customer phone's information.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer phone's information.
                    spa: Teléfono del cliente
                    por: Telefone do cliente
                  properties:
                    area_code:
                      type: String
                      example: '55'
                      description: Phone's area code.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Phone's area code.
                        spa: Código de área
                        por: Código de área
                    number:
                      type: String
                      example: '991234567'
                      description: Phone number.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Phone number.
                        spa: Número telefónico
                        por: Número de telefone
                identification:
                  type: object
                  description: Customer identification's information.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer identification's information.
                    spa: Información sobre la identificación del cliente
                    por: Informações sobre a identificação do cliente
                  properties:
                    type:
                      type: String
                      example: 'CPF'
                      description: Identification type.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Identification type.
                        spa: Tipo de identificación
                        por: Tipo de identificação
                    number:
                      type: String
                      example: '12345678900'
                      description: Identification number.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Identification number.
                        spa: Número de identificación
                        por: Número de identificação
                default_address:
                  type: String
                  example: "Home"
                  description: Customer's default address.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's default address.
                    spa: Dirección por defecto del cliente
                    por: Endereço padrão do cliente
                address:
                  type: object
                  description: Default address's information.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Default address's information.
                    spa: Información sobre la dirección por defecto del cliente
                    por: Informação sobre o endereço padrão do cliente
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: String
                      example: '123123'
                      description: Address ID.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Address ID.
                        spa: Identificador de la dirección
                        por: Identificador de endereço
                    zip_code:
                      type: String
                      example: '01234567'
                      description: Zip code.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Zip code.
                        spa: Código postal
                        por: Código postal
                    street_name:
                      type: String
                      example: 'Rua Exemplo'
                      description: Street name.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Street name.
                        spa: Calle
                        por: Rua
                    street_number:
                      type: number
                      example: 123
                      description: Street number.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Street number.
                        spa: Número
                        por: O Número
                date_registered:
                  type: Date(ISO_8601)
                  example: '22021-10-20T11:37:30.000-04:00'
                  description: Customer's registration date.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's registration date.
                    spa: Fecha de registro del cliente
                    por: Data de registo do cliente
                description:
                  type: String
                  example: 'Description del user'
                  description: Customer's description.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's description.
                    spa: Descripción del cliente
                    por: Descrição do cliente
                default_card:
                  type: String
                  example: 'None'
                  description: Customer's default card. 
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Customer's default card.
                    spa: Tarjeta por defecto del cliente
                    por: Cartão padrão do cliente
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 000000001-sT93QZFAsfxU9P5
                    description: Customer ID.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer ID.
                      spa: Identificador de cliente
                      por: Identificador de cliente
                  email:
                    type: string
                    example: jhon@doe.com
                    description: Customer's email.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's email.
                      spa: Email del cliente
                      por: E-mail do cliente
                  first_name:
                    type: string
                    example: Bruce
                    description: Customer's name.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's name.
                      spa: Nombre del cliente
                      por: Nome do cliente
                  last_name:
                    type: string
                    example: Wayne
                    description: Customer's last name.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's last name.
                      spa: Apellido del cliente
                      por: Sobrenome do cliente
                  phone:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      area_code:
                        type: string
                        example: 23
                        description: Phone's area code.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Phone's area code.
                          spa: Código de área
                          por: Código de área
                      number:
                        type: string
                        example: 12345678
                        description: Phone number.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Phone number.
                          spa: Número telefónico
                          por: Número de telefone
                    description: Customer phone's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer phone's information.
                      spa: Teléfono del cliente
                      por: Telefone do cliente
                  identification:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      type:
                        type: string
                        example: DNI
                        description: Identification type.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identification type.
                          spa: Tipo de identificación
                          por: Tipo de identificação
                      number:
                        type: string
                        example: 12345678
                        description: Identification number.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identification number.
                          spa: Número de identificación
                          por: Número de identificação
                    description: Customer identification's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer identification's information.
                      spa: Información sobre la identificación del cliente
                      por: Informações sobre a identificação do cliente
                  address:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: Address ID.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Address ID.
                          spa: Identificador de la dirección
                          por: Identificador de endereço
                      zip_code:
                        type: string
                        example: SG1 2AX
                        description: Zip code.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Zip code.
                          spa: Código postal
                          por: Código postal
                      street_name:
                        type: string
                        example: Old Knebworth Ln
                        description: Street name.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Street name.
                          spa: Calle
                          por: Rua
                      street_number:
                        type: number
                        format: nullable
                        description: Street number.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Street number.
                          spa: Número
                          por: O Número
                    description: Default address's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Default address's information.
                      spa: Información sobre la dirección por defecto del cliente
                      por: Informação sobre o endereço padrão do cliente
                  date_registered:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Customer's registration date.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's registration date.
                      spa: Fecha de registro del cliente
                      por: Data de registo do cliente
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: This is my description
                    description: Customer's description.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's description.
                      spa: Descripción del cliente
                      por: Descrição do cliente
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2018-02-20T15:36:23.541Z
                    description: Customer's date created.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's date created.
                      spa: Fecha de creación del cliente
                      por: Data de criação do cliente
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Last modified date.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Last modified date.
                      spa: Fecha de la última modificación
                      por: Data da última modificação
                  metadata:
                    type: object
                    description: metadata
                  default_card:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Customer's default card.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's default card.
                      spa: Tarjeta por defecto del cliente
                      por: Cartão padrão do cliente
                  default_address:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Customer's default address.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's default address.
                      spa: Dirección por defecto del cliente
                      por: Endereço padrão do cliente
                  cards:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                    description: Customer's cards.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's cards.
                      spa: Tarjetas del cliente
                      por: Cartões do cliente
                  addresses:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                    description: Customer's addresses.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's addresses.
                      spa: Dirección del cliente
                      por: Endereço do cliente
                  live_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Whether the customers will be in sandbox or in production mode.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Whether the customers will be in sandbox or in production mode.
                      spa: Indica si los clientes se crean en el entorno de sandbox o producción
                      por: Indica se os comentários são criados no ambiente de sandbox ou produção
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 100--the credentials are required.
                      - 101--the customer already exist.
                      - 102--missing customer id.
                      - 103--parameter must be an object 
                      - 104--parameter length is too large.
                      - 105--the customer id is invalid.
                      - 106--the email format is invalid.
                      - 107--the first_name is invalid.
                      - 108--the last_name is invalid.
                      - 109--the phone.area_code is invalid.
                      - 110--the phone.number is invalid.
                      - 111--the identification.type is invalid.
                      - 112--the identification.number is invalid.
                      - 113--the address.zip_code is invalid.
                      - 114--the address.street_name is invalid.
                      - 115--the date_registered format is invalid.
                      - 116--the description is invalid.
                      - 117--the metadata is invalid.
                      - 118--the body must be a Json Object.
                      - 119--the card is required.
                      - 120--card not found.
                      - 121--the card is invalid.
                      - 122--the card data is invalid.
                      - 123--the payment_method_id is required.
                      - 124--the issuer_id is required.
                      - 125--invalid parameters.
                      - 126--invalid parameter. You cannot update the email.
                      - 127--invalid parameter. Cannot resolve the payment method of card, check the payment_method_id and issuer_id.
                      - 128--the email format is invalid. Use 'test_payer_[0-9]{1,10}@testuser.com'.
                      - 129--the customer has reached the maximum allowed number of cards.
                      - 140--invalid card owner.
                      - 150--invalid users involved.
                      - 200--invalid range format (range=:date_parameter:after::date_from,before::date_to).
                      - 201--range attribute must belong to date entity.
                      - 202--invalid 'after' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 203--invalid 'before' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 204--invalid filters format.
                      - 205--invalid query format.
                      - 206--attributes to sort must belong to 'customer' entity.
                      - 207--order filter must be 'asc' or 'desc'.
                      - 208--invalid 'sort' parameter format.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - unauthorized--unauthorized.
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - not_found--not_found.
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Get customer
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Get customer
        spa: Obtener cliente
        por: Obter cliente
      description: Check all the information of a client created with the client ID of your choice
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Check all the information of a client created with the client ID of your choice
        spa: Consulta toda la información de un cliente creado con el ID del cliente que quieras
        por: Veja todas as informações de um cliente a partir da sua identificação
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Customer ID.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Customer ID.
            spa: Identificador de cliente
            por: Identificador de cliente
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 123123
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 470183340-cpunOI7UsIHlHr
                    description: Customer ID.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer ID.
                      spa: Identificador de cliente
                      por: Identificador de cliente
                  email:
                    type: string
                    example: comprador_mlb01+470183340@asdf12.com.br
                    description: Customer's email.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's email.
                      spa: Email del cliente
                      por: E-mail do cliente
                  first_name:
                    type: string
                    example: Customer
                    description: Customer's name.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's name.
                      spa: Nombre del cliente
                      por: Nome do cliente
                  last_name:
                    type: string
                    example: Tester
                    description: Customer's last name.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's last name.
                      spa: Apellido del cliente
                      por: Sobrenome do cliente
                  phone:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      area_code:
                        type: string
                        example: '11'
                        description: Phone's area code.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Phone's area code.
                          spa: Código de área
                          por: Código de área
                      number:
                        type: string
                        example: '97654321'
                        description: Phone number.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Phone number.
                          spa: Número telefónico
                          por: Número de telefone
                    description: Customer phone's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer phone's information.
                      spa: Teléfono del cliente
                      por: Telefone do cliente
                  identification:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      type:
                        type: string
                        example: CPF
                        description: Identification type.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identification type.
                          spa: Tipo de identificación
                          por: Tipo de identificação
                      number:
                        type: string
                        example: '19119119100'
                        description: Identification number.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identification number.
                          spa: Número de identificación
                          por: Número de identificação
                    description: Customer identification's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer identification's information.
                      spa: Información sobre la identificación del cliente
                      por: Informações sobre a identificação do cliente
                  address:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        example: '1162600213'
                        description: Address ID.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Address ID.
                          spa: Identificador de la dirección
                          por: Identificador de endereço
                      zip_code:
                        type: string
                        example: '05187010'
                        description: Zip code.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Zip code.
                          spa: Código postal
                          por: Código postal
                      street_name:
                        type: string
                        example: Caetano Poli, 12
                        description: Street name.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Street name.
                          spa: Calle
                          por: Rua
                      street_number:
                        type: number
                        description: Street number.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Street number.
                          spa: Número
                          por: O Número
                    description: Default address's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Default address's information.
                      spa: Información sobre la dirección por defecto del cliente
                      por: Informação sobre o endereço padrão do cliente
                  date_registered:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    description: Customer's registration date.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's registration date.
                      spa: Fecha de registro del cliente
                      por: Data de registo do cliente
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: Customer Test
                    description: Customer's description.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's description.
                      spa: Descripción del cliente
                      por: Descrição do cliente
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: '2021-03-16T15:45:17.000-04:00'
                    format: date
                    description: Customer's date created.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer's date created.
                      spa: Fecha de creación del cliente
                      por: Data de criação do cliente
                  date_last_updated:

                    x-description-i18n:

                      por: Data da última modificação
                  metadata:

  /v1/customers/search:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Search customers
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Search customers
        spa: Buscar en clientes
        por: Buscar em clientes
      description: Find all customer information using specific filters
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Find all customer information using specific filters
        spa: Encuentra toda la información de los clientes a través de filtros específicos
        por: Encontre todas as informações do cliente através de filtros específicos
      parameters:
        - name: email
          in: query
          description: Customer's email.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Customer's email.
            spa: Email del cliente
            por: E-mail do cliente
          required: true
